upgradeRequired: Upgrade your account to access this feature

companySettings.title: Company Settings
companySettings.description: Manage your company information, compensation settings, and business details with a Premium subscription.

exportFunctionality.title: Export & Reports
exportFunctionality.description: Export your timesheets to PDF and Excel formats with Premium. Download professional reports for accounting and client billing.

manualTimeEntry.title: Manual Time Entry
manualTimeEntry.description: Add and edit time entries manually with Premium. Free users can only use live time tracking.

editTimeEntry.title: Edit Time Entries
editTimeEntry.description: Modify and update your time entries with Premium. Keep your records accurate and up-to-date.

deleteTimeEntry.title: Delete Time Entries
deleteTimeEntry.description: Remove time entries and maintain clean records with Premium subscription.

specialEntries.title: Special Entries
specialEntries.description: Track sick leave, vacation, holidays, and time off in lieu with Premium. Professional time tracking for all work situations.

advancedReporting.title: Advanced Reporting
advancedReporting.description: Generate detailed analytics and custom reports with Premium subscription.

bulkActions.title: Bulk Actions
bulkActions.description: Edit multiple entries at once and perform mass operations with Premium.

apiAccess.title: API Access
apiAccess.description: Integrate with third-party tools and automate your workflow with Premium API access.
